OUR APPROACH TO PROBLEM-SOLVING

WITH OVER 10 YEARS OF EXPERIENCE, WE BELIEVE IN OUR PROCESS

 

STEP 1: INITIAL CHECKING

After your phone call when you must have discussed your pest problems with one of our exterminators, we’ll arrive at your residential or commercial building at the scheduled time for an initial checking.

We’ll then conduct a thorough inspection of your property to determine the level of the pest infestation. We’ll search for entry and exit point and take into account every factor that led to the invasion.

 

STEP 2: IDENTIFY PEST

Pest identification is crucial to effective and long-lasting pest control and prevention.  A mistake can lead to adopting an improper method and program. All In One Pest Control professionals are trained to identify all kinds of pest. Whether bugs, termites, snakes, fleas, mosquitoes, spiders, bees, or rodents, we’ll identify them.

Based on our findings, we will discuss with you and develop a program that suits your situation. We’ll also arrive at the most effective and environment-friendly pest control and prevention method to make your property pest-free. 

 

STEP 3: IMPLEMENT SOLUTIONS

We’ll then get down to business by using the latest technique and technology to address the pest issue. 

After the treatment, we’ll provide you with a report that details our findings, treatment methods and applications and cost. Our technicians will also make sure the pests have been exterminated through inspection and monitoring and that you are completely satisfied with our services. We are also happy to schedule follow-up visits if required to prevent pests from returning.

.
